text: Marin Raykov Nikolov (born 1959) is the Prime minister of Bulgaria. He began his term as Prime minister in 2013. His predecessor was Boyko Borisov. Before he was prime minister, Raykov was a Minister of Foreign Affairs. He was born in Washington, D.C.. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Government ministers Category:Politicians from Washington, D.C. Category:Prime Ministers of Bulgaria
title: Marin Raykov
